import './App.css'; import React,{useState} from 'react' import {appContext} from './Components/Context.js' import {First,Second,Third} from './Components' const choices=['Bitcoin',"Etherium","Dogecoin","Litecoin","Chainlink"] function App() { const [preferences,setPreferences]=useState({first:"NotSelected", second :"NotSelected", third:"NotSelected" }) return(
{/*

{preferences.first}

{preferences.second}

{preferences.third}

*/}
) } export default App;
